Texts.Chs: 把神埋葬于凡人墓穴之中虽然有些奇怪，我们的神虽然已经逝去，但他仍然活在人们心中，他仍然是克鲁西斯。
Texts.Eng: It is strange to think that our deities lie entombed amongst mortals. Strange to think of our gods dying, and yet all that remains is Kluex. May he live forever.

Texts.Chs: 我们翼族的墓葬群大且多，就连太阳之子都安眠于其中，当然，由于盗墓贼盛行，所以没人知道他在什么位置。
Texts.Eng: Our tombs are vast and many, and the Sunborn through the ages are said to rest in many of them. Of course, the locations of the Sunborn's corpses have never been disclosed due to potential looters, but any tomb one steps in could hold the body of a god.

Texts.Chs:
由翼族学者K'arn_Hollowbeak所编写
翼族的埋葬方式有很多种，通常都会根据死者死前吩咐或是遗嘱来决定其尸体处理方式。某些翼族喜欢葬于大气层，而有些则喜欢火化，大部分人都选择了土葬，但只有最显赫的翼族才会埋于墓穴之中。
Texts.Eng:
by K'arn Hollowbeak, Avian scholar
There are many forms of Avian burial, and the method often comes from the last will and testament of the deceased. Some Avians choose to float off attached to large balloons, while others favour cremation. Many simply opt for burial, but it is only the most important Avians who end up interred in tombs.
